songs.title: Freedom or Death (Mr. President)
songs.lyrics:
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Yeah
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Yeah

I’ll move yayo from L.A. to San Diego
Just me bonilla
Ain’t got no killers on the payroll
You niggas play
Yo you gonna see this shit get fatal
My yankees troop I bet
They gonna shoot when I say so
Believe you better pray
To whoever that you believe in
Have your block booming
From mornign noon and evening
For no apparent reason
We known to go
Off the deep end
Every car is preaching
Cause all my niggas squeezing
And the lips you gonna be needing
Leaving everybody bleeding
Just a bunch of scattered bodies
They bodies are barely breathing
My momma think I’m psycho
The preacher say I’m a heathen
Leave his body holy here
Holy water is where I leave them
Master taught the preacher
That’s when you commit a treason
Cause in turn you go and hinder
The freedom my people seeking
Just like Maximatus obey the scripture he was reading
To justify his role
Just pretending that he was teaching
Never logical
Made every obstacle probable
Just depending  like we need him
When freedom’s impossible
Play my RICO steady justice
Just pretending that I can vote
Press your bus buys tonight
I’m ignited about to blow
Yo, yo

Yo Freedom or death
Freedom or death
Freedom or death

Gotti’s in the other scope
Red beam is at his throat
He’s a germ that want to spread
So death is the anecdote
I’m cracking his cantelope
With a ratchet I’m animal
Family probably won’t miss him
But I bet you they panic though
Truly handy there’s more than to handle
ANd skin a goat
I practice a lot of tactics
The ratchets are plentiful
Extended under the mattress
I’m packing I’m finna go
No mercy I show no pity
I’m witty and cynical
I’m rolling I got the scanner
That’s what the antenna for
12 is puss
Octa don’t wanna get wrapped in this tentacle
Have me sitting up in court
Trying to hang me form a rope
Can’t convict me for the murder
Want to play me for the dope
Fight the case so I go broke
Ain’t no justice this a joke
Put me on the stand they ask
If I did it so I say no
Play my RICO stand and justice
So just pretend that I can go
Here’s the bust pipes at night
So I’m ignited I’m free to go
Yo Freedom or death
Freedom or death
Freedom or death
Freedom
Freedom
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Freedom
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
Freedom
